content: crochetme com/node/105/print notes as you will notice when you start the pattern i leave out the traditional connecting stitches between rounds because i think that gives the rounds a cleaner seamless look but without those connecting stitches it is impossible to see where the round starts and stops so that s when the stitch marker comes in handy place the stitch marker in the first stitch of every round that is where the first stitch of the following round will go the last stitch of the round is the one just before the stitch marker also there is no need to fret if you are short a few stitches or over a few stitches each round because of the intentional ruffling a few stitches missing or added will not make any noticeable difference lastly if you aren t sure which side is the inside it is simply a matter of preference personally i consider the side that faces me while i m working to be the inside the choice is completely up to you pattern instructions body this pattern is
